Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
16.04.2013 GB SCR18091 2. Test if old debtor exist: Removed the tests
If a row exists then set DCDD_DEBC = T203_DEBC_NEW ... and
If this leads to a duplicate key then the selected DCDD row can be deleted ...
and added the If there is another T203 row present where ...
02.10.2008 SH SCR14022 Redesigned BDC204 (No longer tests if there're already
debtors with the new deliverd debtor numbers)
06.06.2008 GB SCR13670 Extended test on DEBTOR_CLIENT_DD (added task DCDD)
20.10.2006 JJ SCR11900 Avoiding duplicate debtors
21.06.2005 SH SCR8517 Extended test on existing DEBC with DEBC_DATDELETED=null
@ Part of previous ODC204, which perfoms database updates, see SCR 5825
-- If there is another T203 row
-- Set variables, uses to call BDC005FILE in group suffix
-- call BDC005FILE for every distinct T203_ADMNO / T203_CLNTNO if
min. one debtor get a new debtor client number
-- Reset variables
-- Check mandatory fields, always have be in file, else error
-- Store unique debtor number of old debtor client
-- Error: "No debtor with this debtornumber"
-- Old debtor exists, perform further updates
-- Update T203_HANDELD = 'Y' to allow restarts
... only if all T203 rows were handeld
